Description: Stamp (vessel): mikyala. Measure of whey. Six line Kufic inscription. Made of green glass.
Curator's comments: The word mikyala seems required by the context but what is visible of it is curiously written. The text given here is based on the assumption that 'kāf' and 'yāʾ' have been transposed.
Bibliographic references: Morton 1985 / A Catalogue of Early Islamic Glass Stamps (158)
Associated names: Named in inscription: 'Abd al-Malik b. Marwān
